reviews.reviewText:
I've been using this product for 3 days now and the vaginal odor is completely gone. I'm going to finish treatment and hopefully would not have to buy it again. I am also using the Homeopathic treatment along with the Prebiotic Supplement. I am truly satisfied with this product. Every womans body reacts different to any kind of medicine but ladies give it a try. It's worth the money and saves you a trip to the Doctors office.
THANK YOU VH ESSENTIALS!!! $

reviews.reviewText: I was having bad vaginal odor and when i went to the doctor they never could find out what it was the smell was so bad i had to wear tampons everyday so the smell wouldn't linger i bought this product last night and this morning i woke up it was back too normal this product is awesome !
